entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 03:49 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
